mutation {
  grantAccessToDataproduct(
    dataproductID: "{{ .dataproduct_id }}"
    subject: "santa@nav.no"
  ) {
    id
  }
	addRequesterToDataproduct(
		dataproductID: "{{ .dataproduct_id }}"
		subject: "rudolf@nav.no"
	)
}


RETURNS

OPTION data.grantAccessToDataproduct.id=IGNORE
ENDOPTS

{
  "data": {
    "grantAccessToDataproduct": {
      "id": "b018bdaf-05ed-401a-b281-5f136aa6d70b"
    },
    "addRequesterToDataproduct": true
  }
}

STORE access_id=data.grantAccessToDataproduct.id
